businessTrends.name: 3D printing
businessTrends.description: The action or process of making a physical object from a three-dimensional digital model, typically by laying down many thin layers of a material in succession.

businessTrendLinks.description: Immediate requirements such as Healthcare related orphapedic or splint related can be printed on demand at airports or local centres
Use of smartphone and biometric authentication to introduce self-boarding to improve On-time Departures KPI
Permanent baggage tag; support for smartcard or embedded baggage tags in luggage

businessTrends.name: Machine Learning
businessTrends.description: Machine Learning is an application of Artificial Intelligence (AI) that provides systems the ability to automatically learn and improve from experience without being explicitly programmed. Machine Learning focuses on the development of computer programs that can access data and use it learn for themselves.

businessTrendLinks.description: Uber in relation to Car Hire or Metro-Transport and UberRush for logistics
Way finding functionality for pax without smartphone access
usage of machine learning to improve the management of disruption and Force majeure
Journey information across multiple modes, via digital signage and smartphone
Automation and AI provide for much better task management as systems and processes support simple automated instructions to enhance concierge processing
